customer_reviews.title: Super-Glue for Hair
customer_reviews.text: this stuff seriously is the best I've tried so far for really holding my lace front on TIGHT. It glues FAST, but will come out with dissolvers, solvents, or plain old baby oil. I love the pointed tip for precise application of any "missed spots" over trying to fix those with a brush. It also easily bonds test-strands of hair for color testing, or would/will bond loose hair into extensions. I'm new at applying adhesives to my head. I'm trying various brush-ons and tapes too, but this product is COOL.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was amazing in highschool
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing in highschool, about 10 years ago. It is not the same now. product_meta.title: Liquid Gold Bond A Weav Extra Super Adhesive 1 oz Tube for Weaves and Hair Extensions
product_meta.description: Size:pack of 1Liquid Gold Bond A Weave Extra Super Adhesive Tube for Weaves and Extensions is 5 times stronger and lasts up to 5 times longer than traditional latex bonding glues. This adhesive will not melt with use of curling irons, flat irons and other heat tools with a Liquid Gold installation! Stylists can offer Liquid Gold Bonding services without the need for special equipment. It can be used for wefted and loose hair, and can be applied close to the scalp. Liquid Gold dries soft, pliable, invisible and will last up to two to three weeks.

Lasts up to 5 times longer than traditional Liquid Gold
Adhesive won't melt with use of heat tools
